pages.name: Tatoba Combo
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:ooo/items/ancient_taka_medal)Ancient Taka$(/l), $(l:ooo/items/ancient_tora_medal)Ancient Tora$(/l), and $(l:ooo/items/ancient_batta_medal)Ancient Batta Medals$(/l)

pages.title: Ancient OOO
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider OOO (2010, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ooo/devices/ooodriver)OOO Driver$(/l)$(br2)Ancient Taka Medal Effects:$(li)Night Vision$(li)Strength VII$(li)Flying VII$(br2)Ancient Tora Medal Effects:$(li)Haste II$(li)Resistance IV$(br2)Ancient Batta Medal Effects:$(li)Speed IV$(li)Jump Boost III

pages.title: Ancient OOO
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider OOO 10th: Core Medal of Resurrection (2022, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ooo/devices/ancient_ooodriver)OOO Driver (Ancient OOO)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Night Vision$(li)Strength VII$(li)Flying VII$(li)Haste II$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Speed IV$(li)Jump Boost III

pages.title: Ancient OOO
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider OOO 10th: Core Medal of Resurrection (2022, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ooo/devices/ancient_ooodriver)OOO Driver (Ancient OOO)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Night Vision$(li)Strength VII$(li)Flying VII$(li)Speed IV$(li)Jump Boost III
